docs.snippet: SAN FRANCISCO, March 6 -- Ship movements on the West Coast proceeded without interruption today as the result of an agreement between steamship companies and radio operators, with an amicable understanding virtually certain to be put on paper next...
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, March 6 -- Ship movements on the West Coast proceeded without interruption today as the result of an agreement between steamship companies and radio operators, with an amicable understanding virtually certain to be put on paper next week by the same companies and the deck officers.

docs.snippet: PRINCETON, N. J., March 7 -- A new exhibition on "Horsemen of the Americas," featuring literature inspired by the cowboys of the United States, the vaqueros of Mexico and the gauchos of Argentina and Uruguay, has been opened in Princeton University's...
docs.lead_paragraph: PRINCETON, N. J., March 7 -- A new exhibition on "Horsemen of the Americas," featuring literature inspired by the cowboys of the United States, the vaqueros of Mexico and the gauchos of Argentina and Uruguay, has been opened in Princeton University's Firestone Library.
docs.abstract: Cowboy literature of N and S Amer exhibited, Firestone Library

headline.main: The Proceedings In the U. N.

docs.snippet: Principal foreign exchanges during the past week followed an irregular trend with the British pound sterling developing an easier tone and the Canadian dollar holding fairly steady. The market experienced no reaction from the sudden announcement of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Principal foreign exchanges during the past week followed an irregular trend with the British pound sterling developing an easier tone and the Canadian dollar holding fairly steady. The market experienced no reaction from the sudden announcement of the illness and then the death of Premier Joseph Stalin.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended March 6, 1953

docs.snippet: " What does the boss do with all the money the company takes in," no longer is a whispered question in lunch rooms. More and more corporations these days in the interest of better employe relations are distributing separate annual reports to...
docs.lead_paragraph: " What does the boss do with all the money the company takes in," no longer is a whispered question in lunch rooms. More and more corporations these days in the interest of better employe relations are distributing separate annual reports to employes, much the same as those sent to shareholders.
docs.abstract: Dun & Bradstreet wkly wholesale index at $6.28
